name: Sewerslide
description:
Surf down a sewer system to escape a giant, mutated crocodile. Your inertia will keep you moving forward, so there’s only three things to remember. Dodge the obstacles, don’t get eaten and recycle.

This game was made for a team assignment in AIE's Game design fundamentals course.

The Team : Archie(me), Kirsten, Anthony, Johnson, Oliver, Riley, Gabriel, Cameron S.
